name: Skyward Spine
description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)

storytext: A spear that can hold up the skies. It was this unshakable resolve that sustained the wind dragon through its mortal battle against its vile nemesis.
